Mannheimer Swartling operates in a global market. In addition to our own international operations, we are allied with leading international law firms. This enables us to offer our clients the very best service wherever in the world they operate.

We devote significant time to external analysis – monitoring developments abroad that may be important to our clients. The firm’s 600 staff are based throughout Sweden, as well as in Brussels, New York and Singapore. Our international practice is served by both our local lawyers overseas and our lawyers in Sweden. Naturally, they work together irrespective of the office where they are based, and – if the engagement so requires – with other leading local law firms around the world. This ensures we can combine full-service expertise with local market knowledge – strengthening our position in the premium business law sector. Use the menu to read more about our global practice. You will also find contact details for each office.
